title: Just got hit with leaverbuster for leaving a game with intentional feeder AMA
body: Leave one game with trolls who won't ff and punished. Yet, people can troll and ruin games w/o recourse.

replies.body: Well, you left the game.

My issue is I'm punished for leaving  1 game but people are allowed to intentionally ruin games w/o punishment.

They are doing it in groups to prevent FF's as well. They should have stricter penalties for griefing premades.

The problem with this is the person you are referring to was not intentionally feeding. They were having a bad game. They were still trying until the end. You wanted to FF @20 because you thought the person lost the game singlehandedly. When the team wouldn't FF you went AFK.

We all have bad games. Someone having a bad game does not make it acceptable to AFK.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=QXWYE2tA,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2016-07-29T23:27:19.309+0000)

Wow you have some nerve. 

This is the same guy who literally replied to me on the boards and told me I'm an intentional feeder and troll and I uploaded all of my games with video proof that I was literally not at any point throwing or feeding on purpose and then you're going to defend other players and just write it off as "they were having a bad game?"

How does anybody take you people serious?

You were punished through manual review, and not by myself. You wrote in to appeal your case, someone reviewed it again, and it was confirmed. You then posted on the forums, I manually reviewed it a third time, and confirmed it again. You have posted in every post of mine since then.

You are welcome to open another player support case if you'd like.

And you are a liar and your company is full of liars and cheats. I've posted in every post of yours since then? This is the utter garbage I'm talking about.

But that's this community's  problem, not mine. It's a good thing you get to do this from behind a screen because I bet it would be tough saying most of this crap to someone's face with a straight face.
I also watched the games and I am wondering where you got proof of intentional feeding?

looking at the guy's match history. playing rammus top with teleport ghost and going 0/8/2 is VERY suspicious, it's entirely possible he was legitly feeding, but just pretending to be a bad player to avoid being caught by the system

And when the best you can do is get to "very suspicious" you do nothing.

It is entirely possible that they were just pretending(maybe even likely), but if you can't determine it for sure that doesn't matter. People really need to wrap their heads around the fact that if you can't be pretty close to 100% sure then the correct response is to do nothing. If you can't prove they are troll you have to treat them as if they aren't. But really for players whether or not they are trolling doesn't change anything anyway. AFKing isn't an acceptable response to a troll existing or a bad player.

whats wrong with teleport ghost on rammus?

its the ultimate flanking setup post 20 mins.

All it takes it was report for Riot's system to take a gander. 

You both deserve to be punished.

>
> Leave one game with trolls who won&#039;t ff and punished. Yet, people can troll and ruin games w/o recourse.

Calling bullshit.  You don't get a Leaverbuster penalty for leaving ONE game. 

Sorry, that's not how the system works.

If you leave a ranked game, doesn't the system prevent you from joining another game for a certain amount of time? I can't remember what the exact time is, as it's been a long time since I dodged a ranked game.

It's possible to win any match, sometimes it's just likelier or much more unlikely to happen.
Often players just ruin any chances of winning just because they lost hope of winning and it seems you're one of them.
No match is lost until it's actually really lost and if you still lose you've had fun, tried your best, learned to formulate strategies with how to deal with such a situation and seen if they worked or not given the matchup.
On a scale of 1 to  10, how would you rate your pain?

1. How many games did you just click around in the fountain actiing you are not AFK to fool the system?

2. What do you define as a troll ?

3. Do you really believe that Riot doesn't punish the ones that need to be punished?

4. If you answered yes to Q3, why do you feel that way?
I'll answer number 3. Because ive seen players with hundreds of losses on 1 champion and 0 wins.
It's like everyone who defends intentional griefing makes me think they are those ppl.

After I left, they continued to play for over 5 mins longer. I still ended the game with the most kills and kill participation (I was at 80%) on my team.

I played my heart out and they fucked me over. It's less grief on me to get away. They wouldn't FF b/c they felt it's up to me to carry their troll asses. I gave them the loss by leaving that they deserved.

1) None. Started ranked yesterday with you responding to something yesterday. I detested the idea but with so many ppl doing it and they wouldn't ff. Not stressing the grief.

2) Intentionally feeding or purposely losing games. 8 deaths pre 20 b/c you keep running through minions to the turret.

3) Yes, I do. 

4) From all of the this DQ bs my friends have told me about. From what I've seen premades can do what they want w/o repercussions. Also, friends have shown me how to track players match history. 

For example, my plat 5 and golds that were intentionally losing games to silvers yesterday. You can look to see that Plat 5 continued playing ranked and losing games horribly to people tiers below them. The plat player has great KDA's on the year except where he is playing  with his club goldies that I witnessed. They then have multiple sub 1.0 kda's against silver players while doing no damage while playing carries.

Lol, do you really want justice from riot?


There is more possibily to get banned for saying "gg ez" than to int feeding for 20 games in a row...
